response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of quality, functionality, and style that truly sets it apart. Given its superior features and craftsmanship, we believe its value far surpasses $150. For a limited time, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $200. This is an opportunity to own a piece that not only serves its purpose brilliantly but also adds a touch of luxury to your life. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 200}
